title: 'Coming Home' review: Zhang Yimou tackles fallout of China's Cultural Revolution
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: Movies - Today 
Two decades later, Zhang takes another run at the subject in "Coming Home," a drama in which the pain inflicted upon one family by Mao Zedon...
